# tf.keras.backend.set_image_data_format

``` python
tf.keras.backend.set_image_data_format(data_format)
```



Defined in [`tensorflow/python/keras/backend.py`](https://www.github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/r1.10/tensorflow/python/keras/backend.py).

Sets the value of the image data format convention.

#### Arguments:

* <b>`data_format`</b>: string. `'channels_first'` or `'channels_last'`.

Example:

```python
    >>> from keras import backend as K
    >>> K.image_data_format()
    'channels_first'
    >>> K.set_image_data_format('channels_last')
    >>> K.image_data_format()
    'channels_last'
```


#### Raises:

* <b>`ValueError`</b>: In case of invalid `data_format` value.
